title: Today in Britain
creator_credit: World Wide Pictures, James Carr and Peter Hopkinson
brief_description: Shows some of the many facets of life in Britain in 1964 and attempts to capture the spirit of the nation. It looks at developments in industry, atomic power, sport and education.
creator_credit_for_label: World Wide Pictures, James Carr and Peter Hopkinson
